title: Ticket #2550: unnecessary spool interaction during job removal and completion
description:
See Red Hat Bugzilla for more details.

Briefly, the schedd is attempting to remove job sandbox directories for jobs that aren't sandboxed, which is a serious performance problem in NFS environments. This is a regression since the 7.4 series and was introduced, as far as I can tell, with the spool directory reorganization in the 7.5.5 timeframe.
remarks:

Dan reviewed the attached patch.
